reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for its form-fitting design that accentuates curves and camouflages cellulite, with one customer noting it fits well over a baby bump. The dress is comfortable, well-made, and made of incredible ribbed material, with one customer describing it as feeling like "PJs made of butter." While the length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it good to the ground and others saying it's too long for walking, customers appreciate its stretchiness and flattering silhouette. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and super soft. Stretchy. Slim.
items.body: Gorgeous dress. Super soft and comfortable. Embrace all the curves. Iâ€™m 23 weeks pregnant and I got size Small. Perfect fit. Super stretchy. I will note though, the pink dress is a bit see through. It will show celulites if youâ€™re sensitive to that. Iâ€™m wearing maternity shorts underneath and it works perfectly. Read more

You can easily dress it up or down, which makes it a staple! The quality is top-tierâ€¦ and this is officially my 4th Roeria dress â€” clearly Iâ€™m a fan! ðŸ–¤âœ¨ Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is KILLER sexy!!!
items.body: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress of course in BLACK. Its nice quality, soft stretch, ribbed fabric that isnt see through, its comfortable, not grabby clingy but close fitting, perfect slinky length, doesnt get stretched out looking after wearing for 20 minutes. Perfect with high heels or flats for dinner, date night, happy hour, a party, to pack for evenings on a vacation or cruise. Wear an awesome long necklace and a soft cashmere wrap and youll look like a million bucks. LOOKS and FEELS EXPENSIVE. I have similar dresses from Saks that were $200 plus that arent as nice as this one! A great all season fashion purchase. Read more
items.author: SML123

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my maternity shoot
items.body: So cute and soft. I wore it for my maternity shoot. It was January in NY and so Cold so I needed something long sleeve. I was 7.5 months preggo. 5â€™4 160 lbs and a medium/large fit. Itâ€™s very form fitting but has good stretch. Iâ€™m sure I will wear it postpartum next fall/winter. The brown color was rich and nice. Material is soft and not see-thru. Itâ€™s not thin, like I said I wore it outside in the cold for a few minutes for pictures. Happy with my choice! Read more
items.author: Christine Routier

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars This dress is amazing

I probably couldâ€™ve gone with medium but then I donâ€™t think itâ€™d fit me postpartum. The length is perfect, the sleeves are perfect length. The price was great. The reason for 4 stars is because could slightly see my black bra through the top but I wouldnâ€™t say itâ€™s see through couldnâ€™t see underwear even when I bent down. With this color just likely have to wear nude bra. Would recommend I plan to buy more colors. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yowsers!
items.body: Didnâ€™t think this dress would snatch like it did. I absolutely love this dress! The fit is incredibleâ€”itâ€™s snug in all the right places, accentuating my shape beautifully. The fabric has a nice stretch, making it comfortable while still feeling elegant and flattering. The length adds a touch of sophistication, and itâ€™s perfect for both casual outings and dressier occasions. I felt confident and chic wearing it! Plus, the color is versatile and easy to style with various accessories. Highly recommend this piece if youâ€™re looking for a timeless, flattering dress that can be worn for multiple occasions. Going to buy this one in more colors. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Khaki, Olive Green, Black, Coffee, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
